backend/main.mo: Main ICP actor implementing the backend for a study hub app, including gallery management, lessons, user profiles, subscriptions, payments (Stripe), withdrawals, and file/video/link storage with access control and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining the old actor state shape (lessons, galleries, payments, subscriptions, etc.) and a no-op `run` function that passes existing state through unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three Razorpay-related frontend features (payment hook, subscription page integration, admin transaction table badge) to their implementation files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of frontend source files, describing each page, hook, and component's purpose and notable implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS file defining CSS custom properties for a neutral light/dark color theme used across the app's UI components and sidebar.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the 'Diploma Smart Study Hub' React app, mounting the app into a `#root` div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all app routes (home, dashboard, branches, content, subscription, payment, quizzes, etc.), wraps authenticated routes in an `AuthGuard`, and provides QueryClient and theme context.
frontend/src/components/admin/BulkDelete: An alert dialog component that confirms bulk deletion of multiple categories, displaying each category name and item count as destructive badges along with the total item count.
frontend/src/components/admin/FileDropZo: A drag-and-drop file upload zone component that validates files by type and size, supporting both drag-and-drop and click-to-browse interactions.
frontend/src/components/admin/GalleryPre: Displays a grid of galleries with their images and videos, providing delete functionality for individual galleries, images, and videos via confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/GalleryUpl: A form component for creating a new gallery with a title, description, and uploading images and videos, organized under a specific branch/semester/subject/chapter hierarchy.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentTra: A filterable table component that displays payment transaction records with status and payment method badges, supporting filtering by method (Stripe, Razorpay, PhonePe/QR) and status.
frontend/src/components/admin/PdfPreview: A dialog component that renders a PDF preview inside an iframe, accepting either a File object or a URL as the source.
frontend/src/components/admin/UploadProg: A single file upload progress row component that shows status icons, a progress bar with upload speed, error messages, and retry/remove action buttons.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserActiva: A dialog component for admins to activate inactive user accounts, showing user details and a warning before confirming activation via the useUserActivation hook.
frontend/src/components/content/GalleryG: Displays a grid of gallery media items (images and videos) with access control, opening a MediaLightbox on click and showing a locked state for non-subscribed, non-admin users.
frontend/src/components/content/LockedCo: Wraps children with a blurred lock overlay and tooltip for non-admin, non-subscribed users, passing through content unchanged for authorized users.
frontend/src/components/content/MediaLig: A full-screen dialog lightbox for navigating and downloading gallery images and videos, supporting keyboard arrow-key navigation and displaying current item index.
frontend/src/components/content/PaymentA: A settings dialog allowing users to enable automatic payments and set a maximum authorized amount, loading and saving configuration via usePaymentAuthorization hooks.
frontend/src/components/content/PaymentH: Renders a table of payment transaction records with status badges, formatted dates, amounts, and payment method, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/content/PaymentQ: Displays a payment UI section that shows either an automatic payment confirmation (when auto-pay is enabled) or a manual QR code scan interface with masked UPI ID and amount details.
frontend/src/components/content/Subscrip: A modal dialog that prompts unauthenticated or unsubscribed users to subscribe, listing features and pricing tiers (₹5/week, ₹29/month, ₹99/6 months) with a navigation button to the subscription page.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Site footer with brand info, quick navigation links, resource links, and subscription plan pricing, plus a copyright line and a Caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Sticky top navigation header with logo, desktop/mobile nav links (conditionally shown based on auth state), and an Internet Identity login/logout button.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Root layout wrapper that composes the Header, a main content area rendered via TanStack Router's Outlet, and the Footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSubscription: React Query hook that fetches all active subscriber Principals from the backend actor, with 30-second cache and actor-readiness gating.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCheck.ts: Hook that queries the backend to determine if the current user is an admin, with a backward-compatible `useIsAdmin` alias returning a simplified boolean result.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPayments.ts: React Query hook that fetches all payment records from the backend and returns them sorted by timestamp descending, intended for admin use.
frontend/src/hooks/useContentAccess.ts: Composable hook that combines admin and subscription status to expose a single `hasAccess` boolean indicating whether the current user can view gated content.
frontend/src/hooks/useFileManagement.ts: Collection of React Query mutation hooks for deleting files, video links, important links, individual categories, and bulk-deleting categories, each invalidating relevant query caches and showing toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useFileUpload.ts: Provides a `useFileUpload` hook that manages a file upload queue with progress tracking, status updates, and retry logic, calling the backend `bulkUpload` method via an actor mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useGalleryContent.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching galleries filtered by category (branch/semester/subject/chapter) and by individual gallery ID from the backend actor.
Exports mutation hooks for creating, deleting, and uploading images/videos to galleries via the backend actor, with toast notifications and query cache invalidation on each operation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context provider and `useInternetIdentity` hook using DFINITY's AuthClient, managing login status, identity persistence, and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/usePaymentAuthorizati: Provides hooks to fetch and update payment authorization settings (auto-payment toggle and max amount), with the mutation currently throwing a not-implemented error as the backend is pending.
frontend/src/hooks/usePaymentConfirmatio: Exports hooks to finalize a Stripe checkout session by session ID and to create a new Stripe checkout session with success/cancel redirect URLs via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePaymentHistory.ts: Fetches the caller's payment records from the backend, sorts them by timestamp descending, and exposes them with loading/fetched state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/usePhonePePayment.ts: Provides hooks to fetch the backend UPI ID, mask it for display, and initiate a PhonePe/UPI payment by constructing a deep link on mobile or showing instructions on desktop.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports hooks to fetch the current caller's user profile and to save/update it via the backend actor, with query cache invalidation on successful save.
frontend/src/hooks/useRazorpayPayment.ts: Custom hook that loads the Razorpay checkout script and exposes a mutation to initiate a payment flow, then invalidates subscription-related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubscription.ts: Custom hook that queries the backend actor to check if the current user's subscription is active, polling every 30 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserActivation.ts: Custom hook that exposes a mutation to activate a user account by Principal via the backend actor, invalidating relevant admin and subscription queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useWithdrawal.ts: Provides three hooks for withdrawal operations: submitting a new withdrawal request with validation, fetching all withdrawal requests, and fetching a single withdrawal request by ID.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind directives, imports Google Fonts, and defines CSS custom properties for a deep navy and amber academic color theme with light and dark mode variants.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility module exporting a `cn` helper that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in TanStack QueryClientProvider and a custom InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page describing the platform's mission, features (comprehensive content, focused learning, community, recognition), and reasons to choose the service.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin-only dashboard showing earnings stats and a withdrawal request dialog with amount and phone number validation, guarded by admin role checks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ContentManageme: Admin-only page for managing educational content, allowing selection of branch, semester, subject, and chapter to upload or preview gallery content.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementP: Admin-only page displaying active subscriptions, payment transactions, and user activation controls across tabbed views with role-based access enforcement.
frontend/src/pages/BranchSelectionPage.t: Page displaying a grid of engineering branches (CSE, ECE, EEE, etc.) as clickable cards that navigate to the corresponding semester selection route.
frontend/src/pages/CertificatesPage.tsx: Page that displays a user's earned certificates as cards with score and download option, falling back to an empty state with a call-to-action if none exist.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: A contact page with a message submission form (name, email, message) and static contact information (email, phone, address). On submit, it shows a success toast and resets the form.
frontend/src/pages/ContentBrowserPage.ts: Displays study materials (PDFs and videos) for a specific branch and semester, gating premium content behind a subscription check and showing a prompt dialog for non-subscribers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Student dashboard showing the user's subscription status, profile info, and quick-navigation cards for all engineering branches and semesters.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Marketing landing page featuring a hero section, branch grid, feature highlights, and subscription plan cards (Weekly, Monthly, Half-Yearly) with navigation to auth and content pages.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: A leaderboard page (requires authentication) displaying ranked users by score, downloads, and quizzes completed, with weekly/monthly/all-time tab views and the current user's rank card.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the DiplomaHub login page with Internet Identity authentication, redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard and handling login errors with toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure screen with common failure reasons and buttons to retry the subscription or return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Handles post-payment confirmation by extracting the Stripe session ID from the URL, calling the payment confirmation hook, and showing a success state with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows a static user profile page with account information and study statistics, redirecting unauthenticated users to the login page.
frontend/src/pages/QuizListPage.tsx: Displays a list of mock quizzes with subject, duration, and completion status, allowing users to start or retake each quiz.
frontend/src/pages/QuizPage.tsx: Placeholder quiz page that displays a 'coming soon' message and a back button navigating to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/RemindersPage.tsx: Renders a study reminders page with a list of mock reminders and a dialog form to create new reminders for exams, assignments, or study sessions.
frontend/src/pages/SemesterSelectionPage: Displays a grid of 8 semesters for a selected branch, showing subject lists and focus-level badges, with navigation to branch selection and content pages.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPage.tsx: Renders subscription plan options (weekly, monthly, half-yearly) and handles payment initiation via both Stripe and Razorpay, redirecting unauthenticated users to login.
frontend/src/utils/fileValidation.ts: Provides utility functions for validating file size, video size, file type, and video type, along with helpers for formatting file sizes and upload speeds.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors (navy, amber, success/warning), fonts, border radii, box shadows, and animations for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project state and feature requests for a subscription payment integration, including existing Razorpay frontend/backend features and pending implementation tasks using the live Razorpay key.
